title: black screen after game ends
body: I have a problem after game ends my screen becomes black

replies.body: If you find a fix for it let me know, I can't keep hardbooting my system because of this.
The thing is I never got one before and today I got 2. I changed nothing in my connection settings.

Thanks for the screenshot!  :P  Black screens like that are usually caused by network problems failing to connect and download assets.  Give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to get that fixed up.  Hope that helps!
